settings.heading: How long does shipping take?
settings.row_content:
Shipping costs will vary depending on the shipping destination and the number of items that your purchase.

The correct amount of shipping fee will show up at the checkout page, with the exception being if you have contacted us directly for engineering services.

settings.heading: How long will it take to ship my order?
settings.row_content: How long it takes to ship an order varies from order to order. Depending upon the service you have requested

settings.heading: How much are the Engineering Services you provide?
settings.row_content: The cost of engineering services varies from order to order and depends on the cost of projects, materials, labour etc. We do our best to ensure our rates are both competitive, fair and low cost to our customers.

settings.text: We're here to help. If you couldn't find the information you were looking for, please reach out to us directly. Our team is eager to assist you.
